amendment.description: To authorize appropriations for a contingent emergency reserve fund for operations in Iraq and Afghanistan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3260 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 0. Record Vote Number: 106.

action.text: Amendment SA 3260 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6316-6320, S6336-6338; text: CR S6316-6317; text as modified: CR S6336) To authorize appropriations for a contingent emergency reserve fund for operations in Iraq and Afghanistan.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3260 proposed by Senator Warner.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3260 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 0. Record Vote Number: 106.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3260 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 0. Record Vote Number: 106.
